Courses.Name: Sign Language Fundamentals
Courses.Description: Comprehensive course teaching basic to intermediate sign language skills for deaf and hard of hearing individuals. Learn essential communication techniques and daily conversation signs.

LessonItems.Name: A-E Finger Spelling
LessonItems.Content: Learn the first five letters of the sign language alphabet with proper hand positioning and movement.

LessonItems.Name: F-J Finger Spelling
LessonItems.Content: Master letters F through J with practice exercises and visual demonstrations.

LessonItems.Name: K-O Finger Spelling
LessonItems.Content: Continue building your alphabet knowledge with letters K through O.

LessonItems.Name: P-T Finger Spelling
LessonItems.Content: Learn letters P through T with detailed hand shape explanations.

LessonItems.Name: U-Z Finger Spelling
LessonItems.Content: Complete the alphabet with letters U through Z and practice full words.

LessonItems.Name: Alphabet Practice Quiz
LessonItems.Content: Test your knowledge with interactive alphabet recognition exercises.

LessonItems.Name: Common Name Spelling
LessonItems.Content: Practice spelling common names using the complete alphabet.

LessonItems.Name: Hello and Goodbye
LessonItems.Content: Learn essential greeting signs for daily interactions.

LessonItems.Name: My Name Is...
LessonItems.Content: Introduce yourself using proper sign language etiquette.

LessonItems.Name: Nice to Meet You
LessonItems.Content: Express politeness and courtesy in sign language.

LessonItems.Name: How Are You?
LessonItems.Content: Ask about wellbeing and respond appropriately.

LessonItems.Name: Thank You and Please
LessonItems.Content: Master essential polite expressions in sign language.

LessonItems.Name: Excuse Me and Sorry
LessonItems.Content: Learn apologetic and attention-getting signs.

LessonItems.Name: Yes and No
LessonItems.Content: Express agreement and disagreement clearly.

LessonItems.Name: Mother and Father
LessonItems.Content: Learn signs for parents and immediate family members.

LessonItems.Name: Brother and Sister
LessonItems.Content: Master sibling relationship signs.

LessonItems.Name: Grandparents
LessonItems.Content: Sign for grandmother and grandfather.

LessonItems.Name: Extended Family
LessonItems.Content: Learn signs for aunts, uncles, and cousins.

LessonItems.Name: Friend and Family
LessonItems.Content: Distinguish between different relationship types.

LessonItems.Name: Family Tree Activity
LessonItems.Content: Practice describing your family structure in sign language.

Courses.Name: Braille Reading and Writing
Courses.Description: Complete Braille literacy program for visually impaired individuals. Master the Braille alphabet, numbers, punctuation, and develop fluent reading and writing skills.

LessonItems.Name: Understanding the Braille Cell
LessonItems.Content: Learn the six-dot Braille cell structure and numbering system.

LessonItems.Name: Letters A-J (First Ten)
LessonItems.Content: Master the first ten letters using dots 1-4.

LessonItems.Name: Letters K-T (Second Ten)
LessonItems.Content: Learn letters K through T with dot 3 added.

LessonItems.Name: Letters U-Z (Final Letters)
LessonItems.Content: Complete the alphabet with letters U through Z.

LessonItems.Name: Capital Letter Indicator
LessonItems.Content: Learn how to indicate uppercase letters in Braille.

LessonItems.Name: Alphabet Recognition Practice
LessonItems.Content: Touch-based exercises to identify letters quickly.

LessonItems.Name: Simple Word Reading
LessonItems.Content: Practice reading basic three and four-letter words.

LessonItems.Name: Number Sign Indicator
LessonItems.Content: Understand the number indicator and its usage.

LessonItems.Name: Numbers 0-9
LessonItems.Content: Learn Braille number representations.

LessonItems.Name: Multi-digit Numbers
LessonItems.Content: Read and write numbers with multiple digits.

LessonItems.Name: Math Symbols
LessonItems.Content: Master plus, minus, multiply, divide, and equals signs.

LessonItems.Name: Simple Addition
LessonItems.Content: Practice basic addition problems in Braille.

LessonItems.Name: Subtraction Practice
LessonItems.Content: Work through subtraction exercises.

LessonItems.Name: Math Problem Solving
LessonItems.Content: Complete mixed math problems independently.

Courses.Name: Mobility and Orientation Training
Courses.Description: Essential skills for independent navigation and movement for individuals with visual impairments. Learn cane techniques, spatial awareness, and safe travel strategies.

LessonItems.Name: Cane Parts and Assembly
LessonItems.Content: Learn about cane components and how to assemble your mobility cane.

LessonItems.Name: Proper Cane Length
LessonItems.Content: Determine the correct cane length for your height.

LessonItems.Name: Grip and Hand Position
LessonItems.Content: Master the proper way to hold your white cane.

LessonItems.Name: Basic Cane Sweep
LessonItems.Content: Learn the fundamental two-point touch technique.

LessonItems.Name: Rhythm and Timing
LessonItems.Content: Coordinate cane movement with your walking pace.

LessonItems.Name: Indoor Practice
LessonItems.Content: Practice basic cane techniques in controlled environment.

LessonItems.Name: Trailing Technique
LessonItems.Content: Use walls and surfaces to navigate indoors safely.

LessonItems.Name: Doorway Detection
LessonItems.Content: Locate and navigate through doorways confidently.

LessonItems.Name: Stairway Safety
LessonItems.Content: Safely ascend and descend stairs using proper techniques.

LessonItems.Name: Furniture Awareness
LessonItems.Content: Detect and navigate around indoor obstacles.

LessonItems.Name: Room Familiarization
LessonItems.Content: Create mental maps of indoor spaces.

LessonItems.Name: Hallway Navigation
LessonItems.Content: Travel through corridors maintaining proper alignment.

Courses.Name: Assistive Technology for Daily Living
Courses.Description: Comprehensive training on adaptive devices and technology that enhance independence for individuals with physical and cognitive disabilities. Learn to use screen readers, voice control, and specialized equipment.

LessonItems.Name: Introduction to JAWS
LessonItems.Content: Learn the fundamentals of JAWS screen reader software.

LessonItems.Name: NVDA Setup and Configuration
LessonItems.Content: Install and configure the free NVDA screen reader.

LessonItems.Name: VoiceOver for Mac/iOS
LessonItems.Content: Master Apple's built-in screen reader.

LessonItems.Name: Basic Navigation Commands
LessonItems.Content: Learn essential keyboard shortcuts for screen readers.

LessonItems.Name: Reading Text
LessonItems.Content: Navigate and read documents efficiently.

LessonItems.Name: Web Browsing
LessonItems.Content: Access websites using screen reader techniques.

LessonItems.Name: Dragon NaturallySpeaking Setup
LessonItems.Content: Install and train professional dictation software.

LessonItems.Name: Voice Profile Training
LessonItems.Content: Create accurate voice recognition profiles.

LessonItems.Name: Basic Dictation
LessonItems.Content: Compose text using voice commands.

LessonItems.Name: Punctuation and Formatting
LessonItems.Content: Add punctuation and format documents by voice.

LessonItems.Name: Editing Commands
LessonItems.Content: Correct and modify text using voice control.

LessonItems.Name: Dictation Practice
LessonItems.Content: Complete writing tasks using voice dictation.

Courses.Name: Sensory Integration and Self-Regulation
Courses.Description: Therapeutic techniques for individuals with autism, ADHD, and sensory processing disorders. Learn strategies to manage sensory input, develop coping mechanisms, and improve focus and emotional regulation.

LessonItems.Name: The Seven Senses
LessonItems.Content: Learn about the five basic senses plus vestibular and proprioceptive systems.

LessonItems.Name: Sensory Overload Recognition
LessonItems.Content: Identify signs of sensory overwhelm in yourself or others.

LessonItems.Name: Sensory Seeking vs Avoiding
LessonItems.Content: Understand different sensory processing patterns.

LessonItems.Name: Personal Sensory Profile
LessonItems.Content: Create your individual sensory preference chart.

LessonItems.Name: Triggers and Patterns
LessonItems.Content: Track what sensory inputs cause difficulties.

LessonItems.Name: Benefits of Deep Pressure
LessonItems.Content: Understand how deep pressure calms the nervous system.

LessonItems.Name: Weighted Blanket Use
LessonItems.Content: Safely use weighted blankets for regulation.

LessonItems.Name: Compression Clothing
LessonItems.Content: Wear compression vests and garments effectively.

LessonItems.Name: Self-Hugging Techniques
LessonItems.Content: Apply deep pressure to yourself for calming.

LessonItems.Name: Heavy Work Activities
LessonItems.Content: Engage in pushing, pulling, and carrying exercises.

LessonItems.Name: Wall Pushes and Chair Pushups
LessonItems.Content: Quick proprioceptive exercises for focus.
